plot: Collision with a quantum filament leaves Troi in charge of a damaged and endangered Enterprise with emergency bulkheads cutting off sections of the ship.

Three children, who attend school aboard the Enterprise, win the top prizes in the science fair, earning themselves a tour of the great ship by Captain Picard. When the Enterprise strikes a quantum filament, the resulting collision causes massive destruction throughout the ship. Various groups of crew members - including the captain and the children - have to work together to overcome their precarious situations and get the starship back up and running before the Enterprise falls victim to its threatening situation.—Good2Go
